summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1954, for the improvement of the alley in block 51, Yesler's 2nd Supplemental Addition to the City of Seattle; being located between 24th Avenue and 25th Avenue, and East Howell Street and East Denny Way, by grading the same, providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 20316 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
